definition: to walk (side part of split character)
to meet/to run into/to come across
to get into difficulties/to meet with danger
to be attacked by an assassin

sentences.english: As often as not the buses are late on foggy days.
sentences.chinese: 遇多雾天气时，公共汽车经常晚点。

sentences.english: And meet joy in these dew-falling hours.
sentences.chinese: 会在这露水降临之时遇欢乐。

sentences.english: Meets the correct person in the wrong time, is a sigh.
sentences.chinese: 在错误锝时间遇丄正确锝人，是一声叹息。

sentences.english: The Master said, "Only when the year turns freezing cold do we realize that pines and cypresses are the last to wither."
sentences.chinese: 孔子说，“岁月遇严寒，才知道松柏是最后凋谢的。”

sentences.english: Have the students met any difficulties in study?
sentences.chinese: 学生们在学习中是否遇过任何困难？

sentences.english: These nagging injuries are things that Jordan never had to deal with.
sentences.chinese: 这些恼人的伤病，乔丹从未遇过。

sentences.english: The mass good bamboo chopsticks, meet heat can't transform as well.
sentences.chinese: 质量好的竹筷子，遇高温也都不会变形。

sentences.english: We never encounter such phenomena in silvering process.
sentences.chinese: 我们镀银时从未遇过这种现象。

sentences.english: Investigate into the offenders relocation information in any other institute;
sentences.chinese: and二调查加害人在其他机构之处遇资料。

sentences.english: Filmed in south back after heavy rains filmed in into the city after the rain streets.
sentences.chinese: 南郊拍摄归来遇大雨，在进入市区后拍摄的雨后街道。

sentences.english: Do not turn right when facing a red light at the intersection.
sentences.chinese: 十字路口遇红灯时禁止转右。

sentences.english: Affinity for the two people in the halfway of the Crackdown.
sentences.chinese: 有缘的是，两个人在半路就遇着了。

sentences.english: If the open-air travel, the weather event of thunderstorms, lightning should pay attention to.
sentences.chinese: 如果在露天旅游时，遇雷雨天气，应注意避雷。

sentences.english: When Taiwan's local finance is in difficulty, the central government may subsidize it as is fit for the circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 台湾地方财政遇有困难时，可由中央政府酌情补助。

sentences.english: Tell me some places to call in case of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 告诉我一些遇事故可以打电话去求援的地方。

definition: to meet/to run into/to come across
to meet by chance/to come across/(of a calendar event) to come along/(of an event) to fall on (a particular day)/to fawn upon
to run into/to come upon/to meet
to chance upon/to coincide fortuitously with sth
a close friend over many years
meet by chance/have a chance encounter
